tool_description:
Obtain all data from any trustpilot website.
Useful to make carrousels with reviews.
Non-official api. Information obtained from their website.
title: Trustpilot

api_list.name: GetFeedbacksbyDomain
api_list.description:
Obtain feedbacks by "domain" and "page".
This also includes information about the business.

utterances.utterance: Can you show me the customer reviews for amazon.com?
I want to see feedback for airbnb.com to check their service quality.
Please get the latest user reviews from netflix.com.
Retrieve all the feedback available for uber.com.
Show me what customers are saying about spotify.com.
I need to find reviews for etsy.com to evaluate their customer satisfaction.
Get the user feedback for zoom.us so I can understand their service better.
Can you fetch the reviews posted on trustpilot for paypal.com?
Please provide the feedback data for linkedin.com from Trustpilot.
I want to see what people think about adobe.com based on their Trustpilot reviews.
